sents: It's not the greatest film, but I have a lot of fondness for it and its quotability can't be denied.
One of the writers, who shall remain nameless to protect the innocent, really scored with the quotable line of the evening.
you will be sent a written quotation for the cost of repairing your machine
The supplier then faxes back a quotation for the total cost of the materials in the quantities desired delivered to the actual job site.
I don't particularly care whether a stock quote is 20 minutes late, but if I wanted current information I'd probably go to Bloomberg.
I suggest individuals not covered by insurance ask for a quote before allowing their vehicle to be towed.
By examining the limits of sums, products and quotients of variable quantities, Mengoli was setting up the basic rules if the calculus thirty years before Newton and Leibniz.

To keep your weight gain at an acceptable level, you may have to reduce your calorie intake a little and make an effort to keep active, but it shouldn't be so difficult to do that it threatens your fun quotient or your sanity.
